github.title: GitHub Token Instructions

steps.step1: Go to GitHub Settings → Developer settings → Personal access tokens → Tokens (classic)
steps.step3: Give your token a descriptive name
steps.step5: Click "Generate token" and copy it immediately

github.note: Fine-grained tokens are also supported with repository access permissions.

steps.step1: Go to GitLab → User Settings → Access Tokens
steps.step2: Enter a token name and optional expiration date
steps.step4: Click "Create personal access token" and copy it

steps.step1: Go to Bitbucket → Personal settings → App passwords
steps.step3: Enter a label for the password

common.securityNote: Keep your token secure and never share it publicly.
common.expirationWarning: Consider setting an expiration date for better security.
common.minimalScopes: Only grant the minimum required permissions.
